reviewText: Inspiring and well-made. Agreed, new favorite Chinese movie. Lots of heart and just enough drama between the characters to build some conflict and personality among them.

I respect what other costumer C. Sawin says on his review about this and that's fine me I loved this movie and happy to have it in my collection. I saw this on Netflix and just had to buy it and ended up getting it for christmas this year. I've never seen a Chinese firefighter movie before and that's what really attracted me to this. I hope Japan or Korea make one. Japan might make an even better one. again very happy with my purchase.

in Cantonese 5.1 or 2.0 Language with optional subtitles
Extra Features are just Well Go USA previews and Trailer for the movie
